summary: SummaryRénergie H.C.F. Triple Serum Eye is part of Lancôme best-selling, trending products in skin care, and for good reason. Its unique triple-chamber formula combines the benefits of a face moisturizer, eye cream, and serum in one, to provide long-lasting hydration, plumping, and smoothing benefits.
details: DetailsBenefitsTriple-Dose Serum: Targets visible signs of aging layer by layer.Customized Dose: Delivers a tailored approach to address volume loss, fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots.Hydrate and Plump: Provides long-lasting hydration for supple, smooth skin.Brighten and Even: Neutralizes dark spots and brightens for a more radiant complexion.Firm and Lift: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for firmer, smoother, more lifted skin.Key IngredientsUnique Triple-Chamber Packaging: Ensures freshness and potency with each pump.Chamber #1 - Hyaluronic Acid & SNK Peptide: A gel serum with low and high molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid for hydration and smoothing, and SNK peptide to smooth dynamic wrinkles.Chamber #2 - Vitamin C+ & Niacinamide: A serum emulsion with Vitamin C and niacinamide to even skin tone and brighten the eye contour.Chamber #3 - Vitamin F: A creamy serum with Vitamin F (Alpha-Linolenic Acid and Linoleic Acid) to smooth skin texture and maintain the skin barrier.Research ResultsVisibly Improves:Fine Lines around Eye Area: -31.9%Undereye Puffiness: -15.9%Radiance: -13.2%Crow's Feet: -12.1%Drooping of upper eyelids: -8.2%*Based on 8-week results in a clinical study with 84 women.4 out of 5 women agreed that:After 1 Week: Skin around the eye area looked firmer, smoother, and overall texture improved.After 2 Weeks: Wrinkles around the eye area looked reduced, skin felt more supple, and overall skin quality improved.After 4 Weeks: Eye puffiness looked reduced, eyelid texture appeared smoother, and skin appeared more radiant.Based on self-assessment results in an 8-week consumer study with 84 women.Item 2626655How To UseOn the first application, activate by pumping several times until all 3 formulas appear. Any extra product that's dispensed into your fingers can be blended together and applied to eye area, so as not to waste.Mix the three phases of the product in your hand or fingertips before applying around the eye area. Press the under-eye area and lift the skin gently toward to your temples, to help depuff the eye bags. Repeat the same action on the upper lids, and then use fingers on both hands alternatively to smooth and sculpt, moving from under the eye to the crow's feet and above the brow.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Alcohol Denat., Gentiana Lutea Root Extract, Adenosine, Biosaccharide Gum-2, Caffeine, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Isopropyl Myristate, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Oleic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate, Stearic Acid, Boron Nitride, Silica, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Isohexadecane, Jojoba Esters, Mica, Octyldodecanol, Octyldodecyl Xyloside, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Polysorbate 80, Propanediol, Propyl Gallate, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sorbitan Oleate, Tin Oxide, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum / Fragrance,Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: On the first application, activate by pumping several times until all 3 formulas appear. Any extra product that's dispensed into your fingers can be blended together and applied to eye area, so as not to waste.Mix the three phases of the product in your hand or fingertips before applying around the eye area. Press the under-eye area and lift the skin gently toward to your temples, to help depuff the eye bags. Repeat the same action on the upper lids, and then use fingers on both hands alternatively to smooth and sculpt, moving from under the eye to the crow's feet and above the brow.

reviews.headline: Definitely NOT the best…
reviews.comments:
Let me preface this review by stating that I was on the search for the best serum that had multiple uses and in my search, this Regenerie H.C.F. Triple Serum consistently came up. I read about all these amazing results that people were having from crows feet diminishing to dark spots disappearing and decided to give it a chance. 
I have been using this serum every single day for the past three months and have not experienced one change!  In fact, I think some of my wrinkles are even getting worse! I'm extremely disappointed, considering the amount of money I paid for this so called "miracle serum". Definitely NOT Lancome's best product.

reviews.headline: This stuff works!
reviews.comments: I have tried a lot of eye creams, but was always frustrated because even though they were hydrating they never did anything for my fine lines and dark circles.  I have been using this product for a week and the fine lines have VANISHED.  My undereye skin is plump, and my dark circles have diminshed.  Very impressed!!!!

reviews.headline: Finally found what I need
reviews.comments:
First product I've used where I've seen results (41 btw). It's pricey but worth every penny. I love lancôme! Best skincare in my opinion and I've tried many. 
Only issue is the pump, takes a few days to get all 3 serums...

reviews.headline: Great item
reviews.comments: Just as any other cosmetic item, it takes time after using this product for a week my under eyes feel smoother and brighter. This is expensive, but you don't have to use a lot.

faceoff_positive.comments: I just HAVE TO tell you about my most recent product testing experience!Let me begin with the fact that this was the perfect item for me to test& review.Although I HATE to admit this,I am a 50 year old female that IS NOT in any way, shape or form looking forward to aging! I do have to thank my great genes as I really had not seen signs of aging until a few months ago.Now I'm in search of the most effective& most fabulous products to reverse those signs and be proactive in the fight against any more!I've been dealing with eye issues since my early teenage years but they are just becoming worse as I age.I felt like I've tried it all until 1 day when I received this wonderful little miracle inside my mailbox with a serum that contained magical powers from Lancome,a very well established and reputable brand that seems to have one thing or another for each&every body part&problem.The item I'm referring to is RÈNERGIE YEUX, a high performance anti-aging eye concentrate that's to target global eye contour aging signs and was known to do wonders. With 1 pump from its classically cool container you are provided a triple dose with the "necessities"- a gel serum with hyaluronic acid& advanced SNK-Peptide, an emulsion with a derivative of Vitamin C&a cream infused with Vitamin F. Activate by pumping until the 3 formulas are disbursed and proceed to mix all 3 together (in the palm of your hand works great) and apply on all eye contour in both the morning and evening. I used it consistently for several weeks wondering if this H.C.F. Triple Serum could actually produce noticeable results.I began to document these positive&noticeably obvious changes.I  saw how much more smooth the entire eye contour area became almost totally banishing any "crepey" skin.Plus,the eye lifting effect was undeniable,making my eyes look brighter&more open.The actual circles themselves lightened quite a bit also.Honestly,I couldn't be happier with this serum as it doesn't stop creating positive change.
faceoff_positive.headline: LANCOME'S Triple Eye Serum Creates Triple Effects

faceoff_negative.comments: So while I received this product to review, I would have bought it regardless because I am a lifelong Lancome fan.  I wanted to love this just as much as I love its big brother, the HCF Triple skin serum.  But while the serum itself I think is great, I noticed less lines, less under-eye bags, tons of moisture, 3 things hold me back from loving this and potentially putting it in my routine.  The 3 holes took about 20 or so pumps to finally dispense at the same time.  The skin serum usually needs 3 or 4, which seems less wasteful.  The amount of times I had to try this in order to get all 3 to dispense, was not great. 2nd, also with the pump, 1 full pump is way too much product, I end up using half on my face.  So I'm always using half a pump, which is fine, but the right amount would be nice with a full pump.  3rd, a problem that I used to encounter with the other Renegie eye product, if it gets in your eyes, forget it.  It stings so much! My eye ends up watering to the point where it takes all the product away, or I have to walk around for 20 mins with one eye closed, or I end up rubbing it all off.  The packaging is beautiful, looks amazing with its bigger sidekick. the product does what it says, tackling lines, moisture, undereye bags.  But the dispensing method and the product painful side effects, makes me think I won't be purchasing this, and sticking to my absolue eye products.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wanted to love - just liked
